message: I propose we split the money fairly, with me taking 60% and you getting 40%.  This ensures a good start for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor to make up for the higher depreciation on my end.
I understand the inflation affects us both differently, but a 50-50 split seems like the fairest option considering the circumstances. Let's avoid further devaluation and reach a compromise.
